A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Total disregard for all prior stories and character development. Mostly a childish response and a attempt to bring a sega down to the levels of \"The Hangover\"  Not a serious attempt to tell a new story\, but a regurgitation of the past with the premise that all the characters are morons. Much more like a parody then the next chapter of Skywalker sega.
